snippet: For residents of a battered Belle Harbor, on the Rockaway Peninsula, the biggest fear is being forgotten.
abstract: Francis X Clines The City Life column underscores fear of many residents of Belle Harbor, enclave on Rockaway Peninsula, that New York City will forget about helping the Hurricane Sandy-ravaged area.
lead_paragraph: For residents of a battered Belle Harbor, on the Rockaway Peninsula, the biggest fear is being forgotten.

headline.seo: The Search for Words Amid Hurricane Sandy Devastation
headline.main: The Search for Words Amid Devastation
headline.print_headline: The Search for Words Amid Devastation
